name: Sketch Shadows: A Hand Drawn Story
name_original: Sketch Shadows: A Hand Drawn Story
description:
A game by Not Hideo Kojima!

During a rain with lightning and thunders, the light goes out. By candlelight, a bored boy decides to draw monsters in his notebook, while playing with shadows and perspective.

This game was made for the Hyper Casual Jam 2: https://itch.io/jam/hyper-casual-jam2
